description: Initial Convex project setup and React integration. Install Convex, initialize project, add environment variables, wrap app with ConvexProvider, and verify deployment connection.

tasks.title: Install Convex dependency
tasks.description: As a developer, I need the Convex package installed to use Convex backend services.
acceptanceCriteria: Run npm i convex
convex appears in package.json dependencies
node_modules/convex exists
npm run typecheck passes

tasks.title: Initialize Convex project
tasks.description: As a developer, I need a Convex project created and linked to this codebase.
acceptanceCriteria: Run npx convex dev and follow prompts
Login with GitHub when prompted
Create new project named 'task-manager'
convex/ folder exists with _generated/ types
convex.json config file created at project root

tasks.title: Add Convex environment variable
tasks.description: As a developer, I need the Convex deployment URL configured for the app to connect.
acceptanceCriteria: Create .env.local file at project root
Add VITE_CONVEX_URL=<deployment-url> with actual Convex URL
.env.local is in .gitignore (add if missing)
Create .env.local.example with placeholder value for documentation

tasks.title: Wrap app with ConvexProvider
tasks.description: As a developer, I need the React app wrapped with ConvexProvider to use Convex hooks.
acceptanceCriteria: Import ConvexProvider and ConvexReactClient from 'convex/react' in main.tsx
Create ConvexReactClient instance with import.meta.env.VITE_CONVEX_URL
Wrap App component with ConvexProvider passing client prop
npm run typecheck passes
Verify in browser: app renders without errors

tasks.title: Verify Convex setup
tasks.description: As a developer, I need to confirm Convex is properly connected and working.
acceptanceCriteria: npm run dev starts Vite without errors
npx convex dev runs without errors in separate terminal
Convex dashboard shows deployment as connected
No Convex-related errors in browser console
Existing Dexie functionality still works (dual-write not needed yet)
